title: Public media will stop acting like a legacy airline
description: My first reporting job in public media was as the Central Oregon correspondent for Oregon Public Broadcasting, based in Bend — a city that proudly claims to be the largest in the U.S. more than 100 miles from an interstate highway. I covered the concerns of rural Oregonians, from the tensions around “backyard burning” of...
